name: Pamplemousse (varunkrishnan)
description:
Float through the clouds in this unique language-learning game! 

Make your way safely to the end while correctly translating words along the way. Real-time speech recognition allows you to learn French by speaking and listening, no typing required! 

Features: 

- Speech recognition for both English and French 

- 16 unique stages 

- Custom-made graphics for an aesthetic learning experience 

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right: Move

Hold Space: Fly
